duck: Research Laboratory of Electronics at MIT - The Research Laboratory of Electronics (RLE) at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) was founded in 1946 as the successor to the famed MIT Radiation Laboratory (RadLab) of World War II.

wiki.text:
'RLE' could refer to:

*Run-length encoding *Real life experience *Research Laboratory of Electronics
at MIT *Right-to-left embedding, a Unicode format character controlling text
direction *a medical abbreviation standing for "right lower extremity," meaning
the right leg
wiki.title: RLE
